description.brazilian: Derrotou Selt, Rainha da Areia enquanto o Ultimato do Rebelde foi aplicado

description.english: Defeated Noori, Spectre of Darkness while Rogue's Ultimatum is applied

description.english: Defeated Mortar, Charged Golem while Rogue's Ultimatum is applied

description.russian: Вы победили Мортиру, заряженного голема, пока действовало Кредо изгоя

description.english: Defeated Selt, Mortar, Noori, Ponzu, and Seer with the same peasant
